tool_description: Analyzes hair condition based on visual characteristics, symptoms, and user-reported issues to identify problems like dryness, oiliness, damage, or thinning.

hair_texture.description: Hair texture: fine, medium, or coarse

hair_density.description: Hair density: low, medium, or high

recent_chemical_treatments.description: Whether chemical treatments were applied in last 3 months

daily_styling_heat.description: Whether heat styling tools are used daily

error_messages: Invalid hair texture: Must be one of [fine, medium, coarse]
Invalid hair density: Must be one of [low, medium, high]
Empty symptoms list: At least one visible symptom must be provided
Invalid symptom: Symptoms must be descriptive text strings
Missing required parameter: hair_texture, hair_density, visible_symptoms, and recent_chemical_treatments are required
usage: Provide hair texture, density, visible symptoms, and chemical treatment history. Optionally specify daily heat styling usage. The tool returns a comprehensive condition assessment with severity scores.

overall_condition.description: Overall hair health rating: excellent, good, fair, or poor
